unnormalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for fresh talent. IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad graduates are highly sought after. This year's placements starting Nov 15th, will focus on entry-level management roles. We offer competitive packages, starting from Rs. 8 LPA. Like in "3 Idiots", let's foster innovation. Our Kolkata branch needs engineers with 2+ years' experience too. A total of 50 km distance allowance applies for relocation.
normalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for fresh talent. I I T Delhi and I I M Ahmedabad graduates are highly sought after. This year's placements starting November fifteenth, will focus on entry-level management roles. We offer competitive packages, starting from rupees eight L P A. Like in "three Idiots", let's foster innovation. Our Kolkata branch needs engineers with two plus years' experience too. A total of fifty kilometer distance allowance applies for relocation.
